TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
What exactly is this creature we are hunting?
What exactly is this creature we are hunting?
What exactly is this creature we are hunting?
What exactly is this creature we are hunting?

Liches are among the most powerful servants of Lord Bane. If nothing else, the creature's presence here proves that Bane's hand is behind these events. There is only one road into Silvermyr, we will undoubtedly find the Liche waiting for us there.

Liches are among the most powerful servants of Lord Bane. If nothing else, the creature's presence here proves that Bane's hand is behind these events. There is only one road into Silvermyr, we will undoubtedly find the Liche waiting for us there.

It sounds dangerous.
It sounds dangerous.
It sounds dangerous.
It sounds dangerous.

It is. Here, take this Lichebane Charm. If you wear it, every blow you land will do extra damage to the Liche. Give it to the Queen when you reach Silvermyr - it was she who gave it to me many years ago.

It is. Here, take this Lichebane Charm. If you wear it, every blow you land will do extra damage to the Liche. Give it to the Queen when you reach Silvermyr - it was she who gave it to me many years ago.

You've been to Silvermyr before?
You've been to Silvermyr before?
You've been to Silvermyr before?
You've been to Silvermyr before?
My father was from Silvermyr, though I am not welcome there any longer.
My father was from Silvermyr, though I am not welcome there any longer.
My father was from Silvermyr, though I am not welcome there any longer.
My father was from Silvermyr, though I am not welcome there any longer.
You seem to have a lot of enemies, Darkhunter. What's the problem in Silvermyr?
You seem to have a lot of enemies, Darkhunter. What's the problem in Silvermyr?
You seem to have a lot of enemies, Darkhunter. What's the problem in Silvermyr?
You seem to have a lot of enemies, Darkhunter. What's the problem in Silvermyr?
Look at me... do I look Human or Elven to you?
Look at me... do I look Human or Elven to you?
Look at me... do I look Human or Elven to you?
Look at me... do I look Human or Elven to you?
A little of both, I guess.
A little of both, I guess.
A little of both, I guess.
A little of both, I guess.

Exactly. My father was an Elf, my mother was Human. The Wood Elves of Silvermyr call me a half-breed. Queen Titania was one of the few who was kind to me; she gave me this charm as protection when I last left this forest. Now she has greater need of it than I do.

Exactly. My father was an Elf, my mother was Human. The Wood Elves of Silvermyr call me a half-breed. Queen Titania was one of the few who was kind to me; she gave me this charm as protection when I last left this forest. Now she has greater need of it than I do.

Exactly. My father was an Elf, my mother was Human. The Wood Elves of Silvermyr call me a half-breed. Queen Titania was one of the few who was kind to me; she gave me this charm as protection when I last left this forest. Now she has greater need of it than I do.
I see. But what about Maethelburg? Why can't you travel there?
I see. But what about Maethelburg? Why can't you travel there?
I see. But what about Maethelburg? Why can't you travel there?
I see. But what about Maethelburg? Why can't you travel there?
That was something entirely different - a private matter. You ask too many questions.
That was something entirely different - a private matter. You ask too many questions.
That was something entirely different - a private matter. You ask too many questions.
That was something entirely different - a private matter. You ask too many questions.
Sorry. Didn't mean to pry.
Sorry. Didn't mean to pry.
Sorry. Didn't mean to pry.
Sorry. Didn't mean to pry.
Yes you did. Now, I am in the mood to hunt some Undead. Shall we go?
Yes you did. Now, I am in the mood to hunt some Undead. Shall we go?

Darkhunter
O que exatamente é essa criatura que estamos caçando?
O que exatamente é essa criatura que estamos caçando?
O que exatamente é essa criatura que estamos caçando?
O que exatamente é essa criatura que estamos caçando?

Os liches estão entre os servos mais poderosos de Lord Bane. Se nada mais, a presença da criatura aqui prova que a mão de Bane está por trás desses eventos. Só há uma estrada para Silvermyr, sem dúvida encontraremos o Liche esperando por nós lá.

Parece perigoso.
Parece perigoso.
Parece perigoso.
Parece perigoso.
É. Aqui, pegue este Amuleto Lichebane. Se você usá-lo, cada golpe que você desferir causará dano extra ao Liche. Dê para a Rainha quando chegar a Silvermyr - foi ela quem me deu há muitos anos.
É. Aqui, pegue este Amuleto Lichebane. Se você usá-lo, cada golpe que der causará dano extra ao Liche. Dê para a Rainha quando chegar a Silvermyr - foi ela quem me deu há muitos anos.

Você já esteve em Silvermyr antes?

Meu pai era de Silvermyr, embora eu não seja mais bem-vindo lá.

Você parece ter muitos inimigos, Darkhunter. Qual é o problema em Silvermyr?

Olhe para mim... pareço humano ou élfico para você?

Um pouco dos dois, eu acho.
Um pouco dos dois, eu acho.
Um pouco dos dois, eu acho.
Um pouco dos dois, eu acho.

Exatamente. Meu pai era um elfo, minha mãe era humana. Os elfos da floresta de Silvermyr me chamam de mestiço. A rainha Titânia foi uma das poucas que foi gentil comigo; ela me deu este amuleto como proteção quando deixei esta floresta pela última vez. Agora ela tem mais necessidade dele do que eu.

Entendo. Mas e Maethelburg? Por que você não pode viajar para lá?

Sim, você fez. Agora, estou com vontade de caçar alguns mortos-vivos. Vamos?
